不过我看大部分评价没咋说吓人 我就口述一下 我玩过portal系列 是给我一种茕茕孑立的感觉 但我感觉这游戏比portal恐怖的多 整体色调就很压抑 感觉毛骨悚然 再加上因为是老游戏 模型面数本身就少 贴图糊的一批 里面的怪给人一种反人类的二次方的感觉（本身就吓人 加上老游戏的因素）
玩的时候那抱脸虫突然rua一下就飞来揍你 抱脸虫人形怪走起路来像僵尸 有的关卡在你面前的人类突然就被吃了 要是画面暗一点给人感觉就想玩生化危机4 而且还有那个挂在天花板嘴里掉个绳子的怪 碰到就把你卷上去 太他妈吓人了卧槽 这游戏音效也很怪 反正听起来很令人不适 总而言之很吓人 且区别于普遍的恐怖游戏 用什么暗场景+妖怪+宗教暗示等吓人 这游戏吓人的点我实在说不上来

I have heard of this series my whole time gaming, however due to me growing up with mainly RTS games for PC and everything else on Xbox I never actually got to experience Half Life the "real" way. While I've played the PlayStation port as well as The Orange Box on the Xbox 360 when Hollywood Video still existed. It took me 10 hours to beat Half Life on normal now that I own Half-Life and Half-Life 2 with all the DLC packs finally. 

While granted I have watched quite a lot of videos about the lore, mechanics, speed-running and everything else to do with both Half-Life titles, that was because of how badly I wanted to experience one of the best game series ever created. I would 100% say that I used tricks and whatnot that I remembered while getting to explore and have fun with the famous momentum kink in the game engine.

Overall, I'd say this game lives up to the hype surrounding the series; The amount of puzzle solving I was doing mid-firefight was insanely fun considering one misplaced step while throwing a grenade, satchel charge and firing a rocket from the rocket launcher can completely kill your run and cause quick F7.

10/10 - Half-Life lives up to the word around the net as well as feeling somewhat refreshing compared to FPS titles currently being played. I honestly would call Half-Life somewhat of a precursor to the "Looter-Shooter" genre; At times I felt like I had to back off and sit in a corner to evaluate my ammo and how many enemies I could shoot to pass through an area instead of clearing the area. At one point I even recall long jumping through an entire section with (I don't know the enemy type) armored aliens that have flamethrowers. Basically I enjoyed this title because it was fresh and new to me while also providing me a whole new way to experience not only an FPS game, but also having it blended with puzzles and platforming as well as micromanaging your ammunition and any guards or scientists you're escorting since they love to just stop following you.

Half-Life is a watershed game in many ways. Story driven FPS games can be clearly divided as either pre Half-Life and post Half-Life because of its innovations in story telling, level design, and interactivity. Nevertheless, some of Half-Life's gameplay has dated it a bit, more than its sequel or even classic FPS like Doom or Quake. Still, Half-Life is certainly worth playing and is (mostly) a fantastic game.

PROS:
- Great storyline and experience
- Great enemies and impressive AI for the time
- Great weapons and variety
- Mostly great level design presenting an unbroken, linear narrative
- Expectedly great performance
- Decent value, taking around 9 hours on a first time playthrough

CONS:
- The final levels in Xen are notorious for a reason: they suck
- Some of the movement and clipping feels unrefined

* Do not get the Source version of this game

Цікава гра, яка дає можливість доторкнутися до історії серії та побачити її початок. Незважаючи на більше як двадцять років від випуску, сама гра виглядає приємно. Вражає великий левел дизайн, який дуже відрізняється від прямих коридорів того часу: тут вам і шахти, і відкриті простори, і навіть поїздки на маленькому вагончику. Сучасним виглядає підхід комбінації шутера та вирішення задачок «як пройти це місце».
Взагалі цікавим є використання технологічних можливостей гри. Саме появою легендарного лому розробники підштовхували гравця бити скло, ламати ящики та пробиватися через дошки.

Рекомендую ознайомитися з оригінальною грою в першу чергу, щоб на власні очі побачити та відчути той експірієнс, який отримали гравці у 1998 році.
its good if you like games that throw a challenge at you that takes 15 minutes to understand and solve, then making you feel like a god like chad thundercock mastermind.

Overall good gameplay mechanics, and the graphics are good considering its age.

I get that it's a game with puzzle elements, but sometimes there's so little guidance/hint on where to go, which could make me run around in circles for minutes on.

like once I was stuck in that office complex level, and it turns out there's a vent hole you can break to get inside. Things like this are so subtle, which makes it hard to figure things out.

in comparison, portal 2 has way more hints on where to put your portals. Sometimes the walls that you can portal on has a different lighting, or the props like gel pipes, which can guide you

¿Que no se a dicho de Half Life? Un juego fps que hoy en día se ve primitivo, pero es tan primitivo como excelente.

Una aventura absurda y divertida, una IA fantastica para su tiempo, gráficos que ni se ven tan mal, y ni hablar de la revolución que supuso, claro tiene sus errores (la fase final en Xen, los compañeros, algunos bugs, encarrilados, etc) pero, ¿Se puede criticar tanto a un juego que sigue influenciando a día de hoy, un juego que fue el líder de como se debían hacer las cosas, una leyenda digital? Yo creo que no.

ребятулечки, игра огонь даже спустя 20+ лет. Иногда сложная, жопоподпаливающая и мозговыносящая, но очень крутая и необычная игра. Для нубов она вообще превращается в хоррор 3бучий, хоть и без скримеров, ибо когда ты рыпаешься по коридорам почти без патрон на 20 хп и не понимимаешь откуда тебя снимет солдат, спалит вортигонт или отъ3б3т в рот чертов хедкраб... это неповторимо) не ждите прям мяса, игра не об этом. Вообще если ты у тебя IQ ниже среднего. как у меня, игру ты будешь проходить от сохранения к сохранению (что вообще то нормально) и с гайдом с ютуба на мобиле (что уже не очень приятно). вообще, че я тут распинаюсь, игра старше меня и о ней только сам-не-знаю-кто не знает, да и стоит она 51... а, простите, сейчас же распродажа... стоит она 260 деревянных, anyway, это легенда

Nunca vou me esquecer de todos os momentos que esse jogo me proporcionou, esse jogo foi minha entrada no mundo dos games FPS, aprendi muito com ele, conheci muitas pessoas quando criança, esse jogo ele moldou uma parte de mim.

Todas as vezes que eu entrava nos servidores da HLDMBR.NET eu me divertia muito jogando, sempre muito cheio, sempre muito pegado com grande jogadores e um deles em específico o meu primo Alex que me mostrou esse jogo e eu via ele jogar até conseguir também um PC para jogar, ele era quase como um irmão pra mim, infelizmente no dia 24/07/2021 ele acabou sendo assassinado e agora sempre que vejo esse jogo e entro para jogar alguns mapas eu lembro desse passado e dele também.

Depois de muito tempo jogando o jogo pirata eu pude comprar e deixar ele eternizado nessa conta, eu gostaria muito de poder voltar no tempo que seja só por um dia e reviver essa época sensacional e feliz da minha vida.
